snippet: The British mobile phone operator Vodafone announced on Monday that it had ended talks with Largo, the parent company of Wind Hellas, about combining their operations in Greece.
abstract: The British mobile phone operator Vodafone announced on Monday that it had ended talks with Largo, the parent company of Wind Hellas, about combining their operations in Greece.

headline.main: Vodafone Ends Merger Talks With Greek Rival
